SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.cardDrawing

Class CardMuseum

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.cardDrawing.CardMuseum
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CardMuseum extends Object implements Serializable
This class is a museum of cards. It stores the rendered design of all the cards indexed by their id. It also stores the basic back of a card based on its permanent resource.
See Also:
